title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Lakers-Heat, Browns, LeBron James, Cam Newton
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Lakers-Heat, Browns, LeBron James, Cam Newton
description:
The Heat face two major issues after game 1

The Browns play better the less they have to rely on Baker Mayfield

LeBron James' career is more impressive than Michael Jordan

Cam Newton chose the Patriots because he understood his situation


Guest: Chris Broussard

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
